title: Impersonator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - If you perform the factional Mafia kill, your target is cleaned, and you will gain all of their abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The first time you are investigated, you will appear to be the role that you most recently cleaned.

desc:
Post 1148
*Don't worry, after you die, you will still be "alive" by me...hehe...*
